CaseProceeding.name: CaseProceeding
CaseProceeding.description: Represents a legal and formal demand for the enforcement of an individualâ€™s rights against another party in a court of justice.

AddressId.description: Address of the location where the case proceeding is being conducted.

ApplicationId.description: The relationship between case proceeding and a business license application or an individual application.

CaseFilingDateTime.description: The data and time when the case proceeding was initiated.

CaseId.description: The case associated with the case proceeding record.

Description.description: The description of the case proceeding record.

EndDateTime.description: The date and time when the case proceeding was completed.

ExternalCaseIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the related case in an external system.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for this case proceeding.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the case proceeding record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the case proceeding record owner. Available in API version 62.0 and later.

RelatedCaseProceedingId.description: The ID of a case proceeding related to this case proceeding.

StartDateTime.description: The date and time from when the case proceeding began.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the case proceeding.

SubType.description: The subtype of the case proceeding.
